website_summaries.verdict: Choose this smart microwave if you love the idea of controlling it by voice command – a great choice for consumers with smart homes.
pros: Distances itself from other GE models we considered with its smart capabilities, as it has WiFi connectivity and can be operated with voice commands through Alexa
Scan-to-cook function works with the app to find precise cook times
A mid-sized model with 900 watts of power
Lots of features for a surprisingly low price
cons: Connecting it to WiFi and setting it up for voice control takes some tech savvy

website_summaries.verdict: The Alexa integration is great, but the rest of this GE Microwave's smarts aren't useful enough to make up for its relative lack of power.
pros: The GE Smart Countertop Microwave works with Amazon's Alexa, so you can control it with a voice command
The microwave will send you push notifications when it's done cooking so you don't forget about your snack
cons: The innovative scan-to-cook feature is cooler in theory than in practice, at least for now
It won't actually save you much effort, and you might have trouble finding prepackaged foods that work with the feature
Extras aside, the microwave is a little underpowered for the price

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous microwave
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic microwave I Purchased it because it works with the Amazon Alexa and it really does! So simple once you download the app and sync it with the Amazon echo everything works great I am visually impaired and this is much better than a talking microwaves and a lot cheaper would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Alice b

customer_reviews.title: Beep Beep, Beep Beep Beep Beep Beep, Beep.
customer_reviews.text: For some reason I've never quite (beep) determined, the microwave (beep) lets out beeps, randomly, several (beep) times a day, at all (beep) hours. It's so annoying, I now (beep) unplug the machine when Im (beep) not using it. This isn't an easy thing to (beep8 do, as the plug is in a difficult (beep) place to reach, but it's (beep) the only way to (beep) stop it.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Thompson Rocks

customer_reviews.title: NOT worth the money for 900 watts
customer_reviews.text: To me... this is a disaster! I was unable to get the geneova app to do anything except microwave for +30 seconds and customer service had me add a 3rd party app that works about 33% of the time with Alexa. The voice commands are practically useless as the app only accepts commands like this: "microwave for 2 minutes" and no pre heating is available by voice. Genevoa app needs to be SERIOUSLY updated . If voice control is important, you should wait for the Alexa microwave. I wish I had had the choice.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Good microwave
customer_reviews.text: Good microwave. It works great, I just am not sure what’s so special about it being “smart”. Yes, I can start my microwave on my phone but I would still have to physically put something in there, so it seems a little silly. BUT, the microwave heats great and looks really great
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon/Tori Sherman

customer_reviews.title: people who are visually impaired will need help setting up.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife who is visually impaired. She needed my help to set up and pair to Alexa. The voice commands are not that intuitive, but once you learn what to say, it is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Codfish

customer_reviews.title: Just get it. The future is groovy
customer_reviews.text: The good: Once it's setup the voice command is instant. It brings a smile to my face. The bad: Setup works but it's confusing. I'm still not sure how I did it. Getting your phone settings right and downloading the right app (Kitchen) took a little time. Alexa is picky about how you phrase your words. Wishes: I wish the shopping list feature in my Alexa app would coordinate with the list of available bar code items.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Zorro

customer_reviews.title: Lacks good directions for Alexa connection
customer_reviews.text: Need to download the skill on Alexa and connects well. Good for when you need to start something while cooking something else.
customer_reviews.author: haynesd1

customer_reviews.title: after that everything was easy. I've had no problems using Alexa or scan-to-cook
customer_reviews.text: Took a few tries to get GE app to connect, after that everything was easy. I've had no problems using Alexa or scan-to-cook.
customer_reviews.author: MrsWho

customer_reviews.title: Not Great (Even Without Smart Functions)
customer_reviews.text: This microwave definitely has some flaws. The door is slightly hanging and not perfectly level, and the buttons don’t light up?!? What?!? That seems weird. Also, it’s a lower power which I knew but don’t love. And last the steam gets between the outside glass and the inside liner. Very strange. I’ve never seen that happen before. I’m concerned that it will cause damage in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Folcos

customer_reviews.title: Nice small size!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the size for our small countertop and it fits perfectly! We do have Alexa so we hooked it up, but never use it since clicking the buttons is so easy. Wish that the clock color was white not green. Looks kind of old school and I prefer the modern clock color of white/blue. Overall happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.....
customer_reviews.text: Very east set up and intergration to smart house. Unboxed and removed all the tape and film, plugged in and set up was a breeze. Knowing this was coming today, I set up the GE account via the app and linked to my Alexa via U Connect. Followed the set up steps and with in 5 mins I was heating up coffee in it is my voice. Great job GE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The first 48 hour review from an engineer
customer_reviews.text: So I initially had issues having password authentication from the app to the appliance. To get around it I chose a dish washer and went through the install steps and it worked. Then I would notice the device going off the wifi. From my observation it looks like the microwave wakes up and connects to wifi when you open and close it's door. Then it goes online and will respond to Alexa. I haven't tested the scan to cook tech yet. It looks like it's still new and being built out.
customer_reviews.author: firewallguy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was looking forward to using the GE Smart Alexa microwave. Shipping box seemed fine, no damage. Upon taking microwave out of packing noticed the control panel on the left was a bit loose. Tried to use the microwave, chatted with customer support and could not get it to turn on either manually or with Alexa. Would not be turned on because the door was not secure. Had to repack the microwave and now am trying to figure out how I get it to UPS drop off facility. Will not re-purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Debra L Bostelman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the blind or visually impaired
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the blind! No need to guess where the buttons are anymore you just tell your Alexa device how long to cook your item... I love it! No problems with this item, very very nice looking very modern square lines very well-made! Thank UGE.
customer_reviews.author: Roxane Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great Microwave
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our kitchen. Easy to use, I am not really fan for giving instruction by Alexa, but obviously my kids are really happy with this function. A good price for a microwave which using everyday. Like it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Li

customer_reviews.title: MicroWave works for me
customer_reviews.text: We bought this primarily because we needed a smaller counter-top microwave oven. We've had it a couple of months and it works fine. We don't cook in the microwave, we do popcorn, reheat food, and melt cheese. For all those things I can recommend this oven.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: While mine made it past a few months.
customer_reviews.text: Its not even a year old yet and the turntable is jumping like the gear has stripped out. Makes a strange grinding noise than pops. Time for a replacement for the price it should have lasted longer than 6-7 months.
customer_reviews.author: armyofsquirrels

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money it broke down after 9mon
customer_reviews.text: The microwave would beep intermittently which is very distracting for no reason 10 months after having the unit it stopped rotating food I've never had of microwave break so quickly not even a year not worth the money I would never suggest buying another G product like this again they were closed so I have information for you though this is originally what you wanted
customer_reviews.author: EDWIN RODRIGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Door button defective
customer_reviews.text: The Alexa feature is nice, but the door button sticks and is difficult to open EVERY time. I bought this microwave a year ago and will now be replacing it because of this frustrating experience.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Encinas

customer_reviews.title: Very cool microwave.
customer_reviews.text: Love the microwave just wish there were settings for any of the products I use. I also like that the unit can not be turned on unless it detects the door was open within a specific timeframe.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Smaller and Fits into space
customer_reviews.text: Not as large as my last one but it works well and I like the express cook functions that go up to 6 minutes. A thirty second button as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lura C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but the door seems to not be even with the unit itself. Didn't notice until the return date passed.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Perez

customer_reviews.title: very small
customer_reviews.text: Just ok. I don't really use the Alexa feature. Kind of useless for me.
customer_reviews.author: RonzHouse

customer_reviews.title: Not so smart-smart microwave
customer_reviews.text: This microwave stopped working after only 1 year of use. It has locked the door and won’t open even when it says it’s unlocked. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: MB T.

customer_reviews.title: So far POS
customer_reviews.text: The MWO arrived today, unpacked and set it up. So far so good ! It blew up ! Only 6 months old ! REALLY ?
customer_reviews.author: NYB

customer_reviews.title: as expected
customer_reviews.text: Needed a small, multipurpose microwave to set at our bar. Works well, as expected from a GE appliance.
customer_reviews.author: R. Michael Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent.
customer_reviews.text: It would have received a five star if they had better instructions. Great microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Not very user friendly... ended up giving it away instead of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: m4lmx

customer_reviews.title: A Microwave I can control with my Voice
customer_reviews.text: So far it been working as advertised. Really am enjoying the ability to use Alexa voice control and mobile app.
customer_reviews.author: kakarot1657

customer_reviews.title: Why wifi?
customer_reviews.text: The controls are not intituitave. And, the rotating glass plate will not stay in place. The wifi feature seems completely unnecessary.
customer_reviews.author: You Are Here

customer_reviews.title: Hard to set up and operates on very limited number of commands to Amazon Echo.
customer_reviews.text: The app for allowing Amazon Echo to control the microwave was very hard to set up and does not respond to all commands needed to operate the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Alexa does NOT recognize the microwave
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is, a microwave. The connectivity is a not feature. But alexa doesn't recognize the microwave. May change in the future, but as of February 2019 is does not
customer_reviews.author: Mark Eastwood

customer_reviews.title: So HAPPY with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love this microwave that pairs with Alexa! My dad is blind and this makes it so much easier for him to cook and be independent.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Button to open door broke by month 3, out of warranty of course, now a paperweight
customer_reviews.text: Button to open door broke by month 3, out of warranty of course, now a paperweight
customer_reviews.author: John M. Austin Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I think you could get better for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a really basic microwave smart feature is cool to talk about but not used.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool..
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, works well. App is convenient. Is there a way to tell what items are in their database? I scanned 5 items and only one worked (Lean Cuisine).
customer_reviews.author: Lamarc Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Controlling it with Alexa is pretty convenient
customer_reviews.text: Being able to use Alexa to control the microwave is so convenient! I tried “Alexa, defrost 3lbs of chicken” and it worked! Never have to press those compilocate buttons again. “Alexa, heat one cup of coffee” also worked! Then I tried “Alexa stop the microwave” , no problem! Can’t wait to explore what else it can do.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

product_meta.title: GE JES1097SMSS 0.9 Cu. Ft. Capacity Smart Countertop Microwave Oven with Scan-To-Cook Technology, WiFi Connect, Convenience Cooking Controls, and Auto and Time Defrost, in Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Pattern Name:MicrowaveGE Appliances provide up-to-date technology and exceptional quality to simplify the way you live. With a timeless appearance, this family of appliances is ideal for your family. And, coming from one of the most trusted names in America, you know that this entire selection of appliances is as advanced as it is practical. Equipped with connected capabilities via Amazon Alexa and WiFi Connect, you can use your voice to operate your microwave from any room in the house. Take the guesswork out of microwaving frozen foods and prepare your favorites exactly how the manufacturer inteded with just a scan of a barcode. GE Appliance countertop microwave ovens are available in a variety of color and design options. Countertop microwaves eliminate the need to alter or adjust the current design of your kitchen, all you need is available counter top space and an outlet.

specifications.Special Features: WiFi Connect - Works with Google Assistant and Alexa, so you can use your voice to operate your microwave from any room in the house, Scan-to-cook technology - Take the guesswork out of microwaving frozen foods and prepare your favorites exactly how the manufacturer intended with just a scan of a barcode
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars108 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
